metadata.Title: CVE-2017-5448 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
An out-of-bounds write in "ClearKeyDecryptor" while decrypting someClearkey-encrypted media content. The "ClearKeyDecryptor" code runs withinthe Gecko Media Plugin (GMP) sandbox. If a second mechanism is found toescape the sandbox, this vulnerability allows for the writing of arbitrarydata within memory, resulting in a potentially exploitable crash. Thisvulnerability affects Firefox ESR < 45.9, Firefox ESR < 52.1, and Firefox <53.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-5448` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 53.0+build6-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
firefox-globalmenu - 53.0+build6-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
firefox-mozsymbols - 53.0+build6-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
firefox-testsuite - 53.0+build6-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firefox package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '53.0+build6-0ubuntu0.16.04.1').
